GBM process simulation

Source: R/simGBM.R
simGBM.Rd

Simulates a Geometric Brownian Motion process

simGBM(S0 = 10, drift = 0, sigma = 0.2, T2M = 1, dt = 1/12)

Arguments

S0

Spot price at t=0

drift

Drift term in percentage

sigma

Standard deviation

T2M

Maturity in years

dt

Time step in period e.g. 1/250 = 1 business day.

Value

A numeric vector of simulated values

Author

Philippe Cote

Examples

simGBM(S0 = 10, drift = 0, sigma = 0.2, T2M = 1, dt = 1 / 12)
#>  [1] 10.000000  8.859921  7.950943  8.137451  8.104889  7.979273  7.728641
#>  [8]  7.401574  6.733497  6.466516  6.607058  6.723346
